p: It is crucial to develop safe and effective vaccines to control the COVID-19 pandemic, eliminate its spread, and ultimately prevent its future recurrence. Since the SARS-CoV-2 virus shares significant sequence homology with two other lethal coronaviruses, SARS and MERS, the vaccines identified in these patents related to SARS and MERS viruses could potentially facilitate the design of anti-SARS-CoV-2 vaccines.
